alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Campbell County through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Savageton, or 16 miles northwest of Wright, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camplex Event Facility. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 111 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
